name: Dark Fight RPG
description:
Happy New Year! Many games, less bugs :)

Take sword and shield and fight with evil.
Upgrade your character, become powerful and invincible...
Game crated in 24H for GameJam. Soon will come updates.
Leave mark and comments. Thanks! Enjoy playing... :)

Best playing on: Android.

WARNING!

On WINDOWS with some resolutions can be problem with UI scale. (Works good on: 1680x1050). Please, i suggest play on Android for fully experience. If can't play, see video below. I did't have time to optimize PC, Sorry :(

Credits:

  • Graphic - J. Bartula + CC0 Librarry
